verses.text: Blow ye the trumpet in Zion , and sound an alarm in my holy mountain : let all the inhabitants of the land tremble : for the day of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* cometh , for \add it is\add* nigh at hand ;\f + \fr 2.1 \ft trumpet: or, cornet\f*

A day of darkness and of gloominess , a day of clouds and of thick darkness , as the morning spread upon the mountains : a great people and a strong ; there hath not been ever the like, neither shall be any more after it, \add even\add* to the years of many generations.\f + \fr 2.2 \ft of many…: Heb. of generation and generation\f*
A fire devoureth before them; and behind them a flame burneth : the land \add is\add* as the garden of Eden before them, and behind them a desolate wilderness ; yea, and nothing shall escape them.
The appearance of them \add is\add* as the appearance of horses ; and as horsemen , so shall they run.
Like the noise of chariots on the tops of mountains shall they leap , like the noise of a flame of fire that devoureth the stubble , as a strong people set in battle array.
Before their face the people shall be much pained : all faces shall gather blackness.\f + \fr 2.6 \ft blackness: Heb. pot\f*
They shall run like mighty men ; they shall climb the wall like men of war ; and they shall march every one on his ways , and they shall not break their ranks :
Neither shall one thrust another ; they shall walk every one in his path : and \add when\add* they fall upon the sword , they shall not be wounded.\f + \fr 2.8 \ft sword: or, dart\f*
They shall run to and fro in the city ; they shall run upon the wall , they shall climb up upon the houses ; they shall enter in at the windows like a thief.
The earth shall quake before them; the heavens shall tremble : the sun and the moon shall be dark , and the stars shall withdraw their shining :

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall utter his voice before his army : for his camp \add is\add* very great : for \add he is\add* strong that executeth his word : for the day of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* great and very terrible ; and who can abide it? \p
¶ Therefore also now, saith the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, turn ye \add even\add* to me with all your heart , and with fasting , and with weeping , and with mourning :

And rend your heart , and not your garments , and turn unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God : for he \add is\add* gracious and merciful , slow to anger , and of great kindness , and repenteth him of the evil.
Who knoweth \add if\add* he will return and repent , and leave a blessing behind him; \add even\add* a meat offering and a drink offering unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God ? \p
¶ Blow the trumpet in Zion , sanctify a fast , call a solemn assembly :

Gather the people , sanctify the congregation , assemble the elders , gather the children , and those that suck the breasts : let the bridegroom go forth of his chamber , and the bride out of her closet.

Let the priests , the ministers of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, weep between the porch and the altar , and let them say , Spare thy people , O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, and give not thine heritage to reproach , that the heathen should rule over them: wherefore should they say among the people , Where \add is\add* their God ?  +  r 2.17  t rule over: or, use a byword against * \p
¶ Then will the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* be jealous for his land , and pity his people.

Yea, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will answer and say unto his people , Behold, I will send you corn , and wine , and oil , and ye shall be satisfied therewith: and I will no more make you a reproach among the heathen :

But I will remove far off from you the northern \add army\add*, and will drive him into a land barren and desolate , with his face toward the east sea , and his hinder part toward the utmost sea , and his stink shall come up , and his ill savour shall come up , because he hath done great things.\f + \fr 2.20 \ft hath…: Heb. hath magnified to do\f* \p
¶ Fear not, O land ; be glad and rejoice : for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will do great things.\f + \fr 2.21 \ft will…: Heb. hath magnified to do\f*
Be not afraid , ye beasts of the field : for the pastures of the wilderness do spring , for the tree beareth her fruit , the fig tree and the vine do yield their strength.

Be glad then, ye children of Zion , and rejoice in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God : for he hath given you the former rain moderately , and he will cause to come down for you the rain , the former rain , and the latter rain in the first \add month\add*.\f + \fr 2.23 \ft the former rain moderately: or, a teacher of righteousness\f*\f + \fr 2.23 \ft moderately: Heb. according to righteousness\f*
And the floors shall be full of wheat , and the fats shall overflow with wine and oil.
And I will restore to you the years that the locust hath eaten , the cankerworm , and the caterpiller , and the palmerworm , my great army which I sent among you.
And ye shall eat in plenty , and be satisfied , and praise the name of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God , that hath dealt wondrously with you: and my people shall never be ashamed.

And ye shall know that I \add am\add* in the midst of Israel , and \add that\add* I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your God , and none else: and my people shall never be ashamed. \p

¶ And it shall come to pass afterward , \add that\add* I will pour out my spirit upon all flesh ; and your sons and your daughters shall prophesy , your old men shall dream dreams , your young men shall see visions :
And also upon the servants and upon the handmaids in those days will I pour out my spirit.
And I will shew wonders in the heavens and in the earth , blood , and fire , and pillars of smoke.
The sun shall be turned into darkness , and the moon into blood , before the great and the terrible day of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* come.

And it shall come to pass, \add that\add* whosoever shall call on the name of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall be delivered : for in mount Zion and in Jerusalem shall be deliverance , as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath said , and in the remnant whom the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall call.
